message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value, potentially much more than $800000. I understand you may not know the full extent of its worth, but I'm confident you'll find it highly beneficial.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. This price reflects the potential value I see in this product, but I'm open to discussing it further if you have any questions or concerns.
